statements: UPDATE ComplianceMonitoring SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ComplianceMonitoring SET company_name = 'New Company Name', regulation_code = 'RegCode123' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ComplianceMonitoring SET regulation_code = 'GDPR', compliance_status = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ComplianceMonitoring SET compliance_status = FALSE, company_name = 'ABC Corp' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE regulations_compliance SET compliance_status='Compliant' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE industry_standards_compliance SET compliance_rating=5 WHERE standard_name='ISO 9001';
UPDATE regulations_compliance SET compliance_status = 'Compliant' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE industry_standards_compliance SET compliance_rating = 5, standard_name = 'ISO 27001' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE compliance_reports SET status = 'Completed' WHERE report_id = 1
UPDATE industry_standards SET standard_name = 'ISO 9001' WHERE standard_id = 3
UPDATE compliance_reports SET report_date = '2022-10-15', status = 'Pending' WHERE report_id = 1001;
UPDATE compliance_checks SET regulation_id = 500, check_date = '2022-09-20' WHERE check_id = 2002;
UPDATE compliance_checklist SET compliance_status = 'Completed' WHERE company_id = 1 AND regulation_id = 2;
UPDATE regulations SET regulation_description = 'Updated description' , regulation_name = 'New Regulation Name' WHERE regulation_id = 5;
UPDATE regulators_regulations SET regulation_description = 'Updated regulation description' WHERE regulator_id = 1
UPDATE companies SET industry_sector = 'Technology', headquarters_location = 'California' WHERE company_id = 3
UPDATE companies SET headquarters_location = 'New York' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE regulations_history SET regulation_status = 'Active' WHERE regulation_name = 'Environmental Regulations';
